item.name: Number of events per day in Elasticsearch

discovery_rule.name: 1.Discover external sources connecting to the org
1.Discover external destinations contacted by the org
2.Discover external frequently accessed websites virtual hosts
2.Discover external rarely accessed websites virtual hosts
4.Discover URLs most frequently accessed from the inside
4.Discover URLs most rarely accessed from the inside
6.Discover TCP ports used to connect from the organization to internet servers
6.Discover UDP ports used to connect from the organization to internet servers
9.Discover ports used to connect to internet facing servers from internet addresses
